title: Adsorption Information Format (AIF)
description: Dictionary for STAR format adsorption experiment and simulation data files

_audit_aif_version.description: version of AIF data names (version tag)

_exptl_operator.description: name of the person who ran the experiment (string)

_exptl_date.description: date of the experiment (string in ISO 8601 format)

_exptl_instrument.description: instrument id used for the experiment (string)

_exptl_method.description: description of method used to determine amount adsorbed, eg. volumetric (string)

_exptl_isotherm_type.description: description of isotherm type, eg. absolute, excess, net (string)

_exptl_p0.description: saturation pressure of the experiment at the temperature of the experiment (float)

_exptl_digitizer.description: name of the person who digitized the experiment (string)

_adsnt_sample_id.description: unique identifying code used by the operator (string)

_simltn_date.description: date of the simulation (string in ISO 8601 format)

_simltn_size.description: num of unit cells, sample mass, etc (string)

_citation_doi.description: the digital object identifier (DOI) of the cited work (string)

_adsorp_pressure.description: equilibrium pressure of the adsorption measurement (float)

_adsorp_p0.description: saturation pressure of the adsorption measurement at the temperature of the experiment(float)

_adsorp_amount.description: amount adsorbed during the adsorption measurement (float)

_desorp_pressure.description: equilibrium  pressure of the desorption measurement at the temperature of the experiment (float)

_desorp_p0.description: saturation pressure of the desorption measurement at the temperature of the experiment (float)

_desorp_amount.description: amount adsorbed during the desorption measurement (float)

_adsorp_amount_excess.description: excess amount adsorbed during the adsorption measurement (float)

_adsorp_amount_absolute.description: absolute amount adsorbed during the adsorption measurement (float)

_adsorp_amount_net.description: net amount adsorbed during the adsorption measurement (float)

_desorp_amount_excess.description: excess amount adsorbed during the desorption measurement (float)

_desorp_amount_absolute.description: absolute amount adsorbed during the desorption measurement (float)

_desorp_amount_net.description: net amount adsorbed during the desorption measurement (float)
